meanings.definition: Not convenient or easy to use
meanings.sent1: The old, rusty bicycle was the unhandiest thing in the garage.
meanings.sent2: Carrying all those heavy books in one trip was the unhandiest idea.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle three watermelons at once was the unhandiest decision he made.
meanings.sent4: Her unhandiest dance moves made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent5: The unhandiest tool in the shed was the broken hammer.

meanings.sent1: He was the unhandiest player on the basketball team, always fumbling the ball.
meanings.sent2: The unhandiest chef in the kitchen kept dropping ingredients on the floor.
meanings.sent3: Her unhandiest attempts at painting resulted in a colorful mess on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The unhandiest magician in town could never pull off a successful trick.
meanings.sent5: The unhandiest student in the art class struggled to hold a paintbrush properly.

meanings.sent1: She felt unhandiest when trying to dance in high heels.
meanings.sent2: The unhandiest puppy in the litter kept tripping over its own paws.
meanings.sent3: His unhandiest moment was when he accidentally knocked over the entire display.
meanings.sent4: The unhandiest waiter in the restaurant spilled drinks on almost every table.
meanings.sent5: The unhandiest clown at the circus kept dropping his juggling balls.
